decision_rule: Apply fixed context operator chain as declared in the program; verdict is AFFIRM iff effective r > 0 after context.
description: Proxy metabolic risk score (normalized). Context includes a conservative threshold shift.
name: Metabolic risk regime
normalization: Scores are normalized externally; sign indicates direction toward regime target.
notes: This is a v1 demonstrator contract; extend with domain-specific scoring pipelines outside SemioCore.
